skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your light. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:

1. Download our HI Connect app from Google Play or iOS App Store then register an account.

2. Configure our devices in our HI Connect app and change appropriate name for your devices.

3. Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Google Play, iOS App Store or Amazon app market then configure Echo with "Alexa" app.

4. Search HI Connect skill from the "Alexa" app skills category.

5. Enable HI Connect skill and you'll be navigated to HI Connect login page.

6. Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.

7. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:

“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white."
